text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion tests recognition of the correct statute for physical books. The candidate answer correctly identifies the *Loi n\u00b081-766 du 10 ao\u00fbt 1981* (Loi Lang) as the basis for the fixed book price system in France, which applies to physical books, even though the context is an online publisher. The answer correctly states that the publisher sets the retail price under this law. This satisfies the requirement for identifying the correct statute regulating physical book pricing.", "criterion_id": "c2bdc5f7-9767-4b95-a5d5-0b43115866d1"}
